status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fdclo","text":"Install Docker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cpr3q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5f7at","text":"If you don't have Docker already, install it. There are two versions, Docker Engine (also known as CE) and Docker Desktop. The Desktop version is more user friendly but since may require commercial license for large enterprise, this tutorial is based on the Docker engine. Both version will work in this protocol. Linux users can install both Docker CE and Desktop, while macOS and Windows users should install Docker Desktop.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1r8h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtrv9","text":"Follow the installation instructions from https://docs.docker.com/engine/install/ ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":39}],"data":{}},{"key":"6p4k6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8AF6EA07638411EF9CB50A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.docker.com/engine/install"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2oeja","text":"Run the following command (replace /your_dir for the base directory where you have your data","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5nrl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"adf84","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"jdg1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e0r43","text":"docker run -it -v /your_dir:/ftmp dnalinux/sspace_longread:latest perl SSPACE-LongRead.pl -c /ftmp/assembly.fasta -p /ftmp/ID.fastq -b /ftmp/outputperlID","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3etrt","text":"Run the following command (replace /your_dir for the base directory where you have your data","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"226u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmal7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ucf3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"64m9b","text":"docker run -it -v /your_dir:/ftmp dnalinux/bwa:0.7.17-3-deb bwa index /ftmp/ID_lr-gapcloser/iteration-1/gapclosed.fasta","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aqkcu","text":" Get your data ready","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8500n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68jkf","text":"You will need fastq data (long reads), short reads, and the assembly data. In the following code, the assembly data file is called assembly.fasta. The long reads file is called ID.fastq. The short reads should be two files (ID_R1.fastq.gz and ID_R2.fastq.gz). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":131,"length":14},{"style":"italic","offset":177,"length":8},{"style":"italic","offset":224,"length":14},{"style":"italic","offset":243,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"quau","text":"If you have more files for short reads, you can concatenate them so you end up with 2 files. For example, if you have ID_L001_R1.fastq.gz, ID_L002_R1.fastq.gz, ID_L001_R2.fastq.gz, ID_L002_R2.fastq.gz, you can concatenate them with these commands:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":118,"length":19},{"style":"italic","offset":139,"length":19},{"style":"italic","offset":160,"length":19},{"style":"italic","offset":181,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9229b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47pfk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dddg7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7oav9","text":"All files should be inside a directory, for example: your_dir","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":53,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9emls","text":"Inside your_dir there should be three directories: funannotate_prep, funannotate and funannotate/ipsout.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":7,"length":8},{"style":"italic","offset":51,"length":16},{"style":"italic","offset":69,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f93gj","text":"You can create them with this command:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"76qpu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e973d","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2rfhm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bddvh","text":"cat ID_L001_R1.fastq.gz ID_L002_R1.fastq.gz \u003e ID_R1.fastq.gz","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cpuu5","text":"cat ID_L001_R2.fastq.gz ID_L002_R2.fastq.gz \u003e ID_R2.fastq.gz","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":27,"offset":9,"style":"italic"},{"length":25,"offset":46,"style":"italic"}],"key":"2o8c7","text":"mkdir -p your_dir/funannotate/ipsout \u0026\u0026 mkdir your_dir/funannotate_prep","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"88io2","text":"Run the following command (replace /your_dir for the base directory where you have your data","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bu1v9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5c87q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cpsjj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1oivq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5uf2g","text":"docker run -it -v /your_dir:/ftmp dnalinux/lr_gapcloser:latest bash /LR_Gapcloser/src/LR_Gapcloser.sh -i /ftmp/outputperlID/scaffolds.fasta -l /ftmp/ID.fastq -o /ftmp/ID_lr-gapcloser","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"85ssk","text":"Run the following command (replace /your_dir for the base directory where you have your data)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c2ho","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tkm4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"51qdf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5obs8","text":"docker run -it -v /your_dir:/ftmp dnalinux/fastp:0.23.4 fastp --in1  /ftmp/ID_R1.fastq.gz --in2  /ftmp/ID_R2.fastq.gz --out1  /ftmp/ID_R1_trim.fastq.gz --out2  /ftmp/ID_R2_trim.fastq.gz","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"drpf7","text":"Run the following command (replace /your_dir for the base directory where you have your data). Replace CPU for your CPU count.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f96gm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8b8at","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ccbqe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4jc80","text":"docker run -it -v /your_dir:/ftmp dnalinux/bwa:0.7.17-3-deb /bin/bash -c \"bwa mem -t CPU /ftmp/ID_lr-gapcloser/iteration-1/gapclosed.fasta /ftmp/ID_R1_trim.fastq.gz /ftmp/ID_R2_trim.fastq.gz \u003e /ftmp/ID_aligned_reads.sam\"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6npq","text":"SAMTOOLS View, Sort and Index","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97hmo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aq91b","text":"Run the following command (replace /your_dir for the base directory where you have your data).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62lf3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"76tsr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5gteh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4eb2i","text":"docker run -it -v /your_dir:/ftmp dnalinux/samtools:1.20-3-deb /bin/bash -c \"samtools view -Sb /ftmp/ID_aligned_reads.sam \u003e /ftmp/ID_aligned_reads.bam\"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"37sm4","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8hr1r","text":"docker run -it -v /your_dir:/ftmp dnalinux/samtools:1.20-3-deb /bin/bash -c \"samtools sort /ftmp/ID_aligned_reads.bam -o /ftmp/ID_sorted_aligned_reads.bam\"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"lsqh","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7r41p","text":"docker run -it -v /your_dir:/ftmp dnalinux/samtools:1.20-3-deb /bin/bash -c \"samtools index /ftmp/ID_sorted_aligned_reads.bam\"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1jqkq","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cc5h3","text":"Run the following command (replace /your_dir for the base directory where you have your data).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"brnr5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"832kg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ekqme","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fn5b2","text":"docker run -it -v /your_dir:/ftmp dnalinux/pilon:1.24-3-deb pilon --genome /ftmp/ID_lr-gapcloser/iteration-1/gapclosed.fasta --frags /ftmp/ID_sorted_aligned_reads.bam --output /ftmp/ID_polished","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7441l","text":"Funannotate Clean and Sort","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fanup","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t46c","text":"Run the following command (replace /your_dir for the base directory where you have your data).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1flh2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9m8cj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"drudg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a5cr4","text":"docker run -it -v /your_dir:/ftmp dnalinux/funannotate:latest /bin/bash -c \"funannotate clean -i /ftmp/ID_polished.fasta -o /ftmp/funannotate_prep/ID_polished_clean.fasta\"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9gkm6","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"660p","text":"docker run -it -v /your_dir:/ftmp dnalinux/funannotate:latest /bin/bash -c \"funannotate sort -i /ftmp/funannotate_prep/ID_polished_clean.fasta -o /ftmp/funannotate_prep/ID_polished_clean_sort.fasta --minlen 1000\"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6qfbf","text":"Run the following command (replace /your_dir for the base directory where you have your data). Remember that is step requires the dfam38_full.0.h5 database installed in /your_dir","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":169,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7spf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"641dq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3sk18","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6iij","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a45h8","text":"docker run -it -v /your_dir:/ftmp dnalinux/repeatmasker:latest /usr/local/RepeatMasker/RepeatMasker -s -species Fungi /ftmp/funannotate_prep/ID_polished_clean_sort.fasta -xsmall","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e4sov","text":"Run the following command (replace /your_dir for the base directory where you have your data). Replace CPU for your CPU count.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddmnv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fb3nh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2v2dd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3dgro","text":"docker run -it -v /your_dir:/ftmp dnalinux/funannotate-gmes-dikarya:latest /bin/bash -c \"funannotate predict -i /ftmp/funannotate_prep/ID_polished_clean_sort.fasta.masked -s ID -o /ftmp/funannotate --cpus CPU\"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e4l7p","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"db4m6","text":"Run the following command (replace /your_dir for the base directory where you have your data). Replace CPU for your CPU count.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1520l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13t1f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2nnga","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4lsp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"aqgqj","text":"docker run -it -v /your_dir:/ftmp -v /your_dir/interproscan-5.69-101.0/data:/opt/interproscan/data -v /tmp:/temp dnalinux/interproscan:5.69-101.0 --input /ftmp/funannotate/predict_results/ID.proteins.fa --disable-precalc --output-dir /ftmp/funannotate/ipsout --cpu CPU","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3cnl8","text":"Run the following command (replace /your_dir for the base directory where you have your data)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6g8uk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b47ga","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1uuf7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"36q8j","text":"docker run -it -v /your_dir:/ftmp dnalinux/funannotate-gmes-dikarya /bin/bash -c \"funannotate annotate -i /ftmp/funannotate --fasta /ftmp/funannotate/predict_results/ID.proteins.fa --species ID --out /ftmp/FA_results --iprscan /ftmp/funannotate/ipsout/ID.proteins.fa.xml\"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
